description: Users may experience unauthorized disclosure of sensitive information when using Microsoft Message Queuing. Specifically, a local or remote attacker could potentially access restricted information through heap memory read operations. This scenario can lead to the exposure of private data, affecting user confidentiality. Systems running various Windows 10 and Windows 11 builds, such as 10.0.22631.3880 and builds 10.0.19045.4651, might be at risk. Consult the respective KB articles, including KB-5040442 and KB-5040448, for more detailed information regarding the required security updates and their relevance to this issue.
